Title: Remember This
Plot: Sally is surprised to say the least when Patrick arrives at her flat at three in the morning to get rid of a spider for her. It turns out that he dreamt her distress call. What can this mean? Does Patrick subconsciously want to protect Sally? More shockingly, does Patrick have a subconscious?  Encouraged by their friends, Sally and Patrick independently tell the story of how they first met...
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Jason Bailey, Rebecca Deren, David Carter, Rachel Shelley, Ryan Philpott
